name: TRIGGER (itch) (Vedang Javdekar)
description:
A physics based game where you are given the ability to tweak platforms and interact with other blocks. Be creative and make the red ball reach the target.

Reach the target FAST!

Beat your own BEST TIME!

Features:

  • 5 levels with unique level design
  • 6 Interactible Blocks

Controls:

Edit Mode (Press E to go to Edit Mode):

  • W:  Increment Value
  • S: Decrement Value
  • D: Next Editable
  • A: Previous Editable
  • Arrow Keys: Pan Camera
  • Mouse Wheel: Adjust Zoom

Run Mode (Press R to go to Run Mode):

  • Spacebar: Trigger
  • R: Restart Level
